text: In Control is the second studio album by multi-international boy band US5. It was released by Triple M Music, Global Music, and Universal Music on 24 November 2006. The album has sold more than 10,000 copies. It is their second most successful album as their debut album Here We Go sold more than 320,000 copies. In addition to the German-speaking countries, it was also published in Poland, where it was awarded a gold disc. The hit "Too Much Heaven" (featuring Robin Gibb) had an hip-hop B-side "Every Other Day". In 2007, they released their reloaded version. Category:2006 albums
title: In Control (US5 album)
